text:
Mr. Harold E. Hill
August 12, I960
- 2 -
Fire me if you want to, but I can't conscientiously go along with a plan
that will involve a lot of effort and money with comparatively small
results. And, as a parting thought, any time and money we put into this
will naturally be taken from some other effort that might be more worthy.
Best regards to you and Dorothy.
Radio and Television Communications
